wrk_consolidado_tbl1: SELECT SUBSTRING(DATA_VENDA, 1, 4) AS ANO, SUBSTRING(DATA_VENDA, 6,2) as MES, SUM(QTD_VENDA) AS QTD_VENDA FROM case.raw_bases GROUP BY ANO,MES ORDER BY ANO;
wrk_consolidado_tbl2: SELECT MARCA, LINHA ,SUM(QTD_VENDA) AS QTD_VENDA FROM case.raw_bases GROUP BY MARCA,LINHA;
wrk_consolidado_tbl3: SELECT MARCA, SUBSTRING(DATA_VENDA, 1, 4) AS ANO, SUBSTRING(DATA_VENDA, 6,2) as MES ,SUM(QTD_VENDA) AS QTD_VENDA FROM case.raw_bases GROUP BY ANO,MES ORDER BY ANO;
wrk_consolidado_tbl4: SELECT LINHA, SUBSTRING(DATA_VENDA, 1, 4) AS ANO, SUBSTRING(DATA_VENDA, 6,2) as MES ,SUM(QTD_VENDA) AS QTD_VENDA FROM case.raw_bases GROUP BY ANO,MES ORDER BY ANO;
